# Python cache files
*.py[cod]
__pycache__/
*.so

# Virtual environment directories
venv/
env/
.virtualenv/

# JetBrains (PyCharm) project files
.idea/
*.iml

# Byte-compiled and temporary files
*.log
*.pot
*.out
*.class

# Package and distribution directories
build/
dist/
*.egg-info/
*.eggs/

# Test result files
coverage.xml
*.cover
*.py,cover
.hypothesis/
.tox/
.nox/

# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# Environment variable files
.env
.env.*
.secret

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Generated files from profiling/debugging
*.prof
*.profraw
*.pstats

# Ignore MyPy and other type-checking artifacts
.mypy_cache/
.dmypy.json
.dmypy/

# Ignore pytest cache
.pytest_cache/

# Ignore temporary files or user-specific files
*.tmp
*.swp
*~
